verses.verse: Behold, <WH2009> a day <WH3117> is coming <WH935> for the Lord <WH3068> when the spoil <WH7998> taken from you will be divided <WH2505> among <WH7130> you.

For I will gather <WH622> all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> against <WH413> Jerusalem <WH3389> to battle, <WH4421> and the city <WH5892> will be captured, <WH3920> the houses <WH1004> plundered, <WH8155> the women <WH802> ravished, <WH7693> and half <WH2677> of the city <WH5892> exiled, <WH3318> <WH1473> but the rest <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> will not be cut <WH3772> off <WH3772> from the city. <WH5892>
Then the Lord <WH3068> will go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> and fight <WH3898> against those <WH1992> nations, <WH1471> as when <WH3117> He fights <WH3898> on a day <WH3117> of battle. <WH7128>

And in that day <WH3117> His feet <WH7272> will stand <WH5975> on the Mount <WH2022> of Olives, <WH2132> which <WH834> is in front <WH6440> of Jerusalem <WH3389> on the east; <WH6924> and the Mount <WH2022> of Olives <WH2132> will be split <WH1234> in its middle <WH2677> from east <WH4217> to west <WH3220> by a very <WH3966> large <WH1419> valley, <WH1516> so that half <WH2677> of the mountain <WH2022> will move <WH4185> toward the north <WH6828> and the other half <WH2677> toward the south. <WH5045>

And you will flee <WH5127> by the valley <WH1516> of My mountains, <WH2022> for the valley <WH1516> of the mountains <WH2022> will reach <WH5060> to Azel; <WH9027> yes, you will flee <WH5127> just <WH9201> as you fled <WH5127> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the earthquake <WH7494> in the days <WH3117> of Uzziah <WH5818> king <WH4428> of Judah. <WH3063> Then the Lord, <WH3068> my God, <WH430> will come, <WH935> [and] all <WH3605> the holy <WH6918> ones <WH6918> with Him!
And it will come <WH1961> about in that day <WH3117> that there will be no <WH3808> light; <WH216> the luminaries <WH3368> will dwindle. <WH7087>

For it will be a unique <WH259> day <WH3117> which <WH1931> is known <WH3045> to the Lord, <WH3068> neither <WH3808> day <WH3117> nor <WH3808> night, <WH3915> but it will come <WH1961> about that at evening <WH6153> time <WH6256> there will be light. <WH216>

And it will come <WH1961> about in that day <WH3117> that living <WH2416> waters <WH4325> will flow <WH3318> out of Jerusalem, <WH3389> half <WH2677> of them toward <WH413> the eastern <WH6931> sea <WH3220> and the other half <WH2677> toward <WH413> the western <WH314> sea; <WH3220> it will be in summer <WH7019> as well as in winter. <WH2779>

And the Lord <WH3068> will be king <WH4428> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> in that day <WH3117> the Lord <WH3068> will be [the only] one, <WH259> and His name <WH8034> [the only] one. <WH259>

All <WH3605> the land <WH776> will be changed <WH5437> into a plain <WH6160> from Geba <WH1387> to Rimmon <WH9558> south <WH5045> of Jerusalem; <WH3389> but Jerusalem will rise <WH7213> and remain <WH3427> on its site <WH8478> from Benjamin's Gate <WH8179> as far <WH5704> as the place <WH4725> of the First <WH7223> Gate <WH8179> to the Corner <WH6438> Gate, <WH8179> and from the Tower <WH4026> of Hananel <WH2606> to the king's wine <WH3342> presses. <WH3342>
And people will live <WH3427> in it, and there will be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> curse, <WH9172> for Jerusalem <WH3389> will dwell <WH3427> in security. <WH983>

Now this <WH2088> will be the plague <WH4046> with which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> will strike <WH5062> all <WH3605> the peoples <WH5971> who <WH834> have gone <WH6633> to war <WH6633> against <WH5921> Jerusalem; <WH3389> their flesh <WH1320> will rot <WH4743> while they stand <WH5975> on their feet, <WH7272> and their eyes <WH5869> will rot <WH4743> in their sockets, <WH2356> and their tongue <WH3956> will rot <WH4743> in their mouth. <WH6310>

And it will come <WH1961> about in that day <WH3117> that a great <WH7227> panic <WH4103> from the Lord <WH3068> will fall <WH1961> on them; and they will seize <WH2388> one <WH376> another <WH7453>'s hand, <WH3027> and the hand <WH3027> of one will be lifted <WH5927> against <WH5921> the hand <WH3027> of another.

And Judah <WH3063> also <WH1571> will fight <WH3898> at Jerusalem; <WH3389> and the wealth <WH2428> of all <WH3605> the surrounding <WH5439> nations <WH1471> will be gathered, <WH622> gold <WH2091> and silver <WH3701> and garments <WH899> in great <WH3966> abundance. <WH7230>

So <WH3651> also like this <WH2088> plague, <WH4046> will be the plague <WH4046> on the horse, <WH5483> the mule, <WH6505> the camel, <WH1581> the donkey, <WH2543> and all <WH3605> the cattle <WH929> that will be in those <WH1992> camps. <WH4264>

Then it will come <WH1961> about that any <WH3605> who are left <WH3498> of all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> that went <WH935> against <WH5921> Jerusalem <WH3389> will go <WH5927> up from year <WH8141> to year <WH8141> to worship <WH7812> the King, <WH4428> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> and to celebrate <WH2287> the Feast <WH2282> of Booths. <WH5521>

And it will be that whichever <WH834> of the families <WH4940> of the earth <WH776> does not go <WH5927> up to Jerusalem <WH3389> to worship <WH7812> the King, <WH4428> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> there will be no <WH3808> rain <WH1653> on them.

And if <WH518> the family <WH4940> of Egypt <WH4714> does not go <WH5927> up or enter, <WH935> then no <WH3808> [rain will fall] on them; it will be the plague <WH4046> with which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> smites <WH5062> the nations <WH1471> who <WH834> do not go <WH5927> up to celebrate <WH2287> the Feast <WH2282> of Booths. <WH5521>

This <WH2088> will be the punishment <WH9128> of Egypt, <WH4714> and the punishment <WH9128> of all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> who <WH834> do not go <WH5927> up to celebrate <WH2287> the Feast <WH2282> of Booths. <WH5521>

In that day <WH3117> there will [be inscribed] on the bells <WH4698> of the horses, <WH5483> "HOLY <WH6944> TO THE LORD. <WH3068>" And the cooking <WH5518> pots <WH5518> in the Lord's house <WH1004> will be like the bowls <WH4219> before <WH6440> the altar. <WH4196>

And every <WH3605> cooking <WH5518> pot <WH5518> in Jerusalem <WH3389> and in Judah <WH3063> will be holy <WH6944> to the Lord <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> and all <WH3605> who sacrifice <WH2076> will come <WH935> and take <WH3947> of them and boil <WH1310> in them. And there will no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> be a Canaanite <WH3669> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> in that day. <WH3117>
